entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
